content:
Hello everyone,

I'm a first year studying mathematics at LMU Munich. I know my way around Haskell and have wrote some Lean. I also attend a lecture (at the LMU) about Minlog, a interactive first oder logic proof system using minimal logic (https://www.ed.math.lmu.de/m/~logik/minlog/).

I enjoy Lean very much since in my experience it's very well made and documented. Also Lean fits very well in my usual development environment (Emacs + Nix flakes + LSP).

I'm joining the community because I've met @Henrik BÃ¶ving this weekend at the Munihac.
Valentin Herrmann has marked this topic as resolved.
